titleStmt.title: News from the new-Jerusalem sent by letters from severall parts, relating some hints and observations of that citty, all conspiring in a testimony that renders it exceeding glorious.
titleStmt.author: S. P. D.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.D. for Giles Calvert,

notesStmt.note: Running title: Some Christian letters declaring their severall experiences.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
